name: Shopping Cart
description: Add products to cart and checkout
backend_requirements: Product model: id, name, price (decimal), description, image_url
Cart stored in session or database: product_id, quantity
PUT /api/cart/:id - update quantity, DELETE /api/cart/:id - remove item
frontend_requirements: Product grid with name, price, image, 'Add to Cart' button
Cart sidebar showing items with quantity controls (+/-)
Remove item button for each cart item
Empty cart message when no items
